sim.app.noc3d
Class NodeUnit

java.lang.Object
  sim.app.noc3d.NodeUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class NodeUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable

The NodeUnit class is used to create node units. This is the place where the packets are instantiated (i.e packet objects are created). Call for setPacket method in the Noc3d is done. Then the packets are scheduled from NodeUnit class step method.

Author:
mankas
